intro: Ouratea brevipedicellata, commonly known as the short-stemmed ouratea, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and oval-shaped leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within the understory of tropical forests. Its botanical features make it an important component of the biodiversity in its native habitat.
